column4: hi... I am looking for the default linux kernel .config file that comes with Ubuntu 6.06 dapper. Where can I get a copy?
yes, I do not have Ubuntu installed at the moment. I need a copy of this .config file now though.
know of a copy online? or can you post it to pastebin.ca ?
it depends what you mean - the one on the CD or the security updated ones ? 386 arch?
x86 linux kernel .config that comes with Ubuntu 6.06 Dapper.
it has changed since the 6.06.1 release
the one that you get installed on your system by default.
I no longer have that one
can someone please paste a copy of their linux kernel .config file to a website so that I can check some IDE / SCSI module settings?
hope it pasted OK - I have torrents running and it was kind of slow....
